snippet: Los Angeles’s decaying roads, sidewalks and water system reflect the challenges many American cities face after years of belt-tightening prompted them to delay basic maintenance.
abstract: Los Angeles's decaying roads, sidewalks and water system reflect challenges many American cities face after years of budget-tightening and delaying basic maintenance; city's size and reliance on automobiles has made Los Angeles symbol of nation's crumbling infrastructure problems.
lead_paragraph: Los Angeles’s decaying roads, sidewalks and water system reflect the challenges many American cities face after years of belt-tightening prompted them to delay basic maintenance.

headline.main: Infrastructure Cracks as Los Angeles Defers Repairs
headline.print_headline: Pipes, Roads and Walks Crack as Los Angeles Defers Repairs
